column4: from ubuntu live cd run gparted click on a poartition adn select check. do this for all partitions and drives that should work for you.
make sure you boot with live cd first ok
boot from a live CD and then run gparted and click on partition and select check? and that should fix the problem
I did what you said, so lets see if it happens again. Or was there something I was suppose to do after that?
